Class dom.net.SessionViewData 

java.lang.Object
    |
    +----dom.serial.Data
            |
            +----dom.net.SessionViewData
public class SessionViewData
extends Data
implements java.io.Serializable
Class for the data in a SessionViewPacket. This is a simple dictionary subclass of dom.serial.Data. A more specialized version of the dom.serial.Data class.

Author:
Scott Lewis
See Also:
SessionViewPacket, Data
